DOC.brief_summary: This registry will remain open for approximately 5 years (4 years of enrollment + 1 year of follow up). Subjects will be followed until Orthotopic Liver Transplant (OLT), resolution of liver decompensation, death, or conclusion of the registry.
DOC.brief_title: Registry Study for Patients With Chronic HBV Receiving Nucleotide Therapy
